The 4th Explainable AI for Computer Vision (XAI4CV) Workshop at CVPR 2025

Recording: YouTube
Date & Time: June 11, 2025, 1pm–5pm (CDT)
Location: Music City Center, Nashville, TN

Motivation

Explainability of computer vision systems is critical for people to effectively use and interact with them...

Schedule

  • 13:00–13:10 Opening
  • 13:10–13:35 Invited Talk – Tsui‑Wei (Lily) Weng
  • 13:35–14:00 Invited Talk – Mihaela van der Schaar
  • 14:00–14:25 Invited Talk – Klaus‑Robert Müller
  • 14:25–14:50 Invited Talk – Chinasa T. Okolo
  • 14:50–15:20 Spotlight Session 1
  • 15:20–16:10 Poster Session
  • 16:10–16:35 Invited Talk – Junfeng He
  • 16:35–16:55 Spotlight Session 2
  • 16:55–17:00 Closing
